WorkItem.ClosedComment: I'm closing this, but I've started a new issue that addresses the underlying problem.
WorkItem.Description:
For my character file, I am getting two different dps values and scores when loading into the two versions.  Here is a screenshot showing the dps differences for the spells on the main rawr screen:
 
http://i.imgur.com/s5ZpJ.jpg
 
All stats on the character appear to be the same, and when I hover over the tooltips for each spell, all of those values are even the same between the two versions of the program, it's only the dps value shown that is different.  I am also attaching a copy of my character xml.
WorkItem.Summary: [Mage] Different DPS values in WPF vs Web version

Comments.Message: This is really strange. The only thing that could have an effect if the base values are the same are any procs. Can you check the special effects for trinkets and any other procs if they match in both versions?
Can you try resetting the item cache for the web version in case you have old data or have modified it in some way?
Resetting the web version's item cache fixed the issue.  I don't recall manually editing any items though.
